author: craigmcc
msg: First crack at an introductory user manual describing how to create
a web application using Tomcat.  Besides the documentation, a basic
version of the "build.xml" and "web.xml" files is provided.
NOTE:  This is the first draft, and portions are incomplete (including
all of Chapter 6).  Feedback is requested on the accuracy, quality, and
content of this manual, as well as suggested improvements.

author: costin
msg: It is just an example on how it looks, can be used after we get 3.1 out.

author: shemnon
msg: Fixing command line invocatin bugs that create NullPointer, i
